title: Carpe Antiperspirant Hand and Foot Lotion Package Deal (1 Hand and 1 Foot Tube - Save 17%), Stop Sweaty Hands and Sweaty, Smelly Feet, Dermatologist-Recommended, Most-Popular
features: EXTRA-EFFECTIVE: The #1 dermatologist-recommended OTC antiperspirant treatment for all over the body. Our clinically proven antiperspirant lotions were specifically designed to stop sweaty hands and feet, and help manage the symptoms of palmar and plantar hyperhidrosis, or excessive hand and foot sweat. Achieve zero sweat, restore confidence, and enjoy life with dry hands and fresh, dry feet!

REDUCE SWEAT AND STANK: With Carpe Antiperspirant Lotion. With just a dime-sized amount, reduce sweaty feet without the downsides of prescription oral treatments or iontophoresis. And with a pea-sized amount, reduce sweat on your hands with safe and effective ingredients. Apply every night and morning for best results, and say goodbye to your sweaty, stinky feet and clammy hands.

AS SEEN ON GOOD MORNING AMERICA: A smooth, non-greasy, and non-irritating antiperspirant lotion made for the sweatiest hands and feet, Carpe includes natural eucalyptus oil and moisturizing ingredients that gently soothe the skin, and avoids greasiness with its quick-drying properties
DEVELOPED WITH DERMATOLOGISTS: Carpe’s scientifically developed formula has been independently tested for safety and efficacy, and proven to be a leading over-the-counter sweat treatment.
DON’T SWEAT IT: 100% Money Back Guarantee. Packaging may vary, Box may not be included. Free from Parabens, Phthalates, Formaldehydes, and Sulfates - Never tested on animals - Filled in the USA
description: David and Kasper, the founders of Carpe, know what it’s like to live with the embarrassing problem of sweaty hands and feet. They created Carpe because there weren’t any solutions out there that worked. For them and for thousands of Carpe customers, Carpe Lotion has become that solution. Customers constantly share stories of how their lives have completely changed because of Carpe. Whether that’s being able to go on a date and hold hands, having a confident handshake and nailing the interview, or just being comfortable and confident in day-to-day life, Carpe can do it for you too! What is Carpe Lotion? Carpe Lotion is a dermatologist-recommended, effective antiperspirant hand and foot lotion that goes on smooth, absorbs fast, and prevents sweaty hands and sweaty, smelly feet. Carpe has a soothing eucalyptus scent that fades quickly after application, so once you rub it in, you are left with nothing but sweat-free hands and feet. And it’ll feel great! Carpe has been proven to be 100% non-irritating in a clinical studies. For Best Results Apply at night before bed (sweat glands are least active) and as needed during the day, every day for at least 4 weeks. The effectiveness increases with extended use.
